# [Interview #212: Robert Jordan's Blog: ONE MORE TIME, Entry #17](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=212#17)

#### Robert Jordan

For Sodas, when you are balefired, you are dead, dead, dead. It almost seemed redundant to say so.
